charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F-On or about October 2003 in Adams County, Illinois, defendant knowingly conspired to manufacture at least 50 grams of a substance containing methamphetame and knowingly possessed at least 5 grams of a substance containing methamphetamine with the intent to distribute in violation of 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B) and 846
